nodes.documentation:
@title MockGatewayPass contract.
 * @notice Mocks gateway contract with successful returns.
nodes.name: MockGatewayPass

nodes.documentation:
@notice Returns bounty amount.
     * @return Amount of ERC20 which needs to be staked by facilitator.
nodes.name: bounty

nodes.documentation:
@notice Initiates the stake process. In order to stake the staker
        needs to approve Gateway contract for stake amount.
        Staked amount is transferred from staker address to
        Gateway contract. Bounty amount is also transferred from staker.
     * @dev parameters are in below order:
     _amount
     _beneficiary
     _gasPrice
     _gasLimit
     _nonce
     _hashLock
     * @return Message hash unique for each request.
nodes.name: stake

nodes.documentation:
@notice Revert stake process and get the stake
        amount back. Only staker can revert stake by providing
        penalty i.e. 1.5 times of bounty amount. On progress revert stake
        penalty and facilitator bounty will be burned.
     * @dev The only parameter is _messageHash.
     *      Returns are in below order:
     - staker_
     - stakerNonce_
     - amount_
nodes.name: revertStake

nodes.documentation:
@title MockGatewayPass contract.
 * @notice Mocks gateway contract with successful returns.
nodes.name: MockGatewayPass

nodes.documentation:
@notice Returns bounty amount.
     * @return Amount of ERC20 which needs to be staked by facilitator.
nodes.name: bounty

nodes.documentation:
@notice Initiates the stake process. In order to stake the staker
        needs to approve Gateway contract for stake amount.
        Staked amount is transferred from staker address to
        Gateway contract. Bounty amount is also transferred from staker.
     * @dev parameters are in below order:

     _gasPrice
     _gasLimit

     * @return Message hash unique for each request.
nodes.name: stake

nodes.documentation:
@notice Revert stake process and get the stake
        amount back. Only staker can revert stake by providing
        penalty i.e. 1.5 times of bounty amount. On progress revert stake
        penalty and facilitator bounty will be burned.
     * @dev The only parameter is _messageHash.
     *      Returns are in below order:
     - staker_
     - stakerNonce_
     - amount_
nodes.name: revertStake

bounty().return: Amount of ERC20 which needs to be staked by facilitator.

revertStake(bytes32).details: The only parameter is _messageHash.     *      Returns are in below order:     - staker_     - stakerNonce_     - amount_

stake(uint256,address,uint256,uint256,ui.return: Message hash unique for each request.

revertStake(bytes32).notice: Revert stake process and get the stake        amount back. Only staker can revert stake by providing        penalty i.e. 1.5 times of bounty amount. On progress revert stake        penalty and facilitator bounty will be burned.

stake(uint256,address,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Initiates the stake process. In order to stake the staker        needs to approve Gateway contract for stake amount.        Staked amount is transferred from staker address to        Gateway contract. Bounty amount is also transferred from staker.

userdoc.notice: Mocks gateway contract with successful returns.
